Package com.github.freddyyj.dialogflow

Class Agent

java.lang.Object
com.github.freddyyj.dialogflow.Agent
public class Agent
extends Object
Agent class. It should be Singleton.
Author:
FreddyYJ_

  • Field Details

    • color

      public ChatColor color
      Agent color for chat response.

  • Constructor Details

    • Agent

      protected Agent​(Core core, String keyPath, String name, ChatColor color) throws InvalidKeyException, IOException
      Constructor with custom Agent name and color.
      Parameters:
      core - DialogFlowPlugin core.
      keyPath - Service key file path for this agent. Default is Key.KEY_PATH.
      name - Custom name for this agent.
      color - Custom color for this agent.
      Throws:
      InvalidKeyException - Throws if service key file is invalid.
      IOException - Throws error when creating sessions or agent object.

    • Agent

      protected Agent​(Core core, String keyPath, ChatColor color) throws IOException, InvalidKeyException
      Constructor with custom Agent color.
      Parameters:
      core - DialogFlowPlugin core.
      keyPath - Service key file path for this agent. Default is Key.KEY_PATH.
      color - Custom color for this agent.
      Throws:
      IOException - Throws if service key file is invalid.
      InvalidKeyException - Throws error when creating sessions or agent object.

    • Agent

      protected Agent​(Core core, String keyPath) throws IOException, InvalidKeyException
      Constructor with default Agent name and color.

      Default Agent name is from DialogFlow agent name. Default Agent color is white.

      Parameters:
      core - DialogFlowPlugin core.
      keyPath - Service key file path for this agent. Default is Key.KEY_PATH.
      Throws:
      IOException - Throws if service key file is invalid.
      InvalidKeyException - Throws error when creating sessions or agent object.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static Agent getInstance​(Core core, String keyPath) throws IOException, InvalidKeyException
      Method for get Agent object.
      Parameters:
      core - DialogFlowPlugin core.
      keyPath - Service key file path for this agent. Default is Key.KEY_PATH.
      Returns:
      new or existed Agent object.
      Throws:
      IOException - Throws if service key file is invalid.
      InvalidKeyException - Throws error when creating sessions or agent object.

    • closeClient

      public void closeClient()
      Close this client.

    • startChatting

      public void startChatting​(Player player) throws InvalidChatStartException
      Start chatting with this agent.
      Parameters:
      player - Player who start chatting.
      Throws:
      InvalidChatStartException - Throws if this player already chatting.

    • isPlayerChatting

      public boolean isPlayerChatting​(Player player)
      Check player is chatting with this agent.
      Parameters:
      player - Player who want to check.
      Returns:
      boolean for this player is chatting.

    • stopChatting

      public void stopChatting​(Player player) throws InvalidChatStopException
      Stop chatting with this agent.
      Parameters:
      player - Player who stop chatting.
      Throws:
      InvalidChatStopException - Throws if this player already doesn't chatting.

    • getPlayerChatting

      public List<Player> getPlayerChatting()
      Get List of Player who are chatting with this agent.
      Returns:
      List of Player who chatting.

    • sendMessage

      public void sendMessage​(Player player, String message, boolean isAsync)
      Send message to this agent once.
      Parameters:
      player - Player who send message.
      message - message that want to send.
      isAsync - send and receive by async. true can be default.

    • sendMessage

      public void sendMessage​(Player player, String message, String languageCode, boolean isAsync)
      Send message to this agent once with special language.
      Parameters:
      player - Player who send message.
      message - message that want to send.
      languageCode - special language code for message.
      isAsync - send and receive by async. true can be default.

    • getDefaultLanguageCode

      public String getDefaultLanguageCode()
      Get default language code for this agent.
      Returns:
      language code.

    • getLanguageCodes

      public List<String> getLanguageCodes()
      Get List of all language code that this agent support.
      Returns:
      List of language code.

    • getLanguageCodeCount

      public int getLanguageCodeCount()
      Get amount of language that this agent support.
      Returns:
      amount of language

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Get name of this agent.
      Returns:
      agent name.

    • setName

      public void setName​(String name)
      Set name of this agent. If name is null, set to DialogFlow Agent name.
      Parameters:
      name - agent name.

    • createSession

      public void createSession​(Player player)
      Create new Session for Player.
      Parameters:
      player - player that want to create

    • removeSession

      public void removeSession​(Player player)
      Close and remove session. If not exist, do nothing.
      Parameters:
      player - player that want to close

    • hasSession

      public boolean hasSession​(Player player)
      Check this agent has session.
      Parameters:
      player - player that want to check
      Returns:
      true if session exist, false if not.

    • getSession

      protected SessionName getSession​(Player player)
      Get session if exist.
      Parameters:
      player - player that want to get
      Returns:
      SessionName if session exist. if not exist, return null.
